meanings.sent1: The company remanufactures old computers to sell them at a lower price.
meanings.sent2: The factory remanufactures car engines to make them run like new.
meanings.sent3: The robot tried to remanufacture the broken toy but ended up making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity remanufactures ordinary materials into beautiful artworks.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to remanufacture objects into something entirely different.

meanings.definition: The act of manufacturing a product again.
meanings.sent1: The remanufactures of smartphones help reduce electronic waste.
meanings.sent2: The remanufactures of furniture give old pieces a new life.
meanings.sent3: The remanufactures of toys in the workshop always bring joy to children.
meanings.sent4: The remanufactures of vintage cars are a labor of love for enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The remanufactures of clothing in the store attract eco-conscious customers.
